resources.string:
"About this application:

"
"This is a proof of concept to see how a developer can get Sms number and content."
"

How it works:

"
"If the Android version on your phone is 19 or higher all the sms" "that you will receive will be caught just before and shown in a Toast/Snackbar/Dialog message" "that will appear on the phone screen no matter where you are at that moment."
"

About me:

"
"For work history, please check my LinkedIn profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/radugabriela" "If you want to expand this app, or you have a different app proposal, feel free to contact me with more details." "Just click on email icon and start typing the message."
